info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 3:24AM EDT until April 8 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston WV
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Hocking River at Athens affecting Athens County.
For the Hocking River...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Hocking River at Athens.
* WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Four homes along 1100 block of Harmony Road flood at 21 to 22 feet. Athens Community Center parking lot and tennis courts flood. At 22.0 feet, Sections of East State Street along with adjacent business parking lots flood. Ohio Route 33 south of Nelsonville begins to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning to 20.3 feet this afternoon and remain near that level through Sunday morning. It will rise to 22.1 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.1 feet on 02/09/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1230 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING
